full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-G DATE: 07/24/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 1210 1211 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8:00-8:30 AM 804 805 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 4:00-4:30 PM 208 209 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 12:30- 1:00 AM 1239 1240 8:30- 9:00 AM 831 832 4:30-5:00 PM 450 451 1:00-1:30 AM 1/2 1/3 9:00-9:30 AM 911 912 5:00 -5:30 PM 511 512 1:30-2:00 AM 132 133 9:30-10:00 AM 946 959 5:30-6:00 PM 538 539 2:00-2:30 AM 202 203 10:00-10:30 AM 11 057 6:00-6:30 PM 610 611 2:30-3:00 AM 247 249 10:30-11:00 AM 1057 1058 6:30-7:00 PM 643 644 3:00-3:30 AM 308 310 11:00-11:30 AM 161 41 7:00-7:30 PM 96 717 3:30-4:00 AM 352 353 11:30-12:00 PM 13 14 7:30-8:00 PM 744 745 4:00-4:30 AM 418 419 12:00-12:30 PM 1235 1236 8:00-8:30 PM 820 821 4:30-5:00 AM 440 441 1:00- 1:30 PM 107 108 8:30- 9:00 PM 840 841 5:00 -5:30 AM 518 519 1:30-2:00 PM 137 139 9:00-9:30 PM 920 921 5:30-6:00 AM 541 542 2:00-2:30 PM 205 206 9:30-10:00 PM 942 943 6:00-6:30 AM 618 619 2:30-3:00 PM 239 240 10:00-10:30 PM 1015 1016 6:30-7:00 AM 641 642 3:00-3:30 PM 309 310 10:30-11:00 PM 1044 1045 7:00-7:30 AM 708 709 3:30-4:00 PM 339 340 11:00-11:30 PM 1144 1145 7:30-8:00 AM 741 742 11:30-12:00 PM 1144 1147 MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-G
TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE
MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten entries in a table format, with some redacted information marked as '(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)'. The document appears to be a check sheet for monitoring inmates in a correctional facility.
